content: Our premium one-layered paper towel is a must-have for any car detailing garage. Each roll is 20cm wide and 300m long, providing you with plenty of paper to tackle any mess. Each package includes six rolls, so you'll have a steady supply on hand. Our paper towel is absorbent, durable, and easy to use, making it perfect for wiping down cars and cleaning up spills. Don't settle for less, choose our top-of-the-line paper towel for all your car detailing needs.
